name: Trader Vic's Sour
instructions:
1. In a cocktail shaker, add all ingredients
2. Shake with ice for 10-12 seconds
3. Strain over fresh ice into an old fashioned glass
description: Trader Vic created countless variations on the sour. This interpretation calls for Scotch as the choice of spirit and orgeat as the sweetener, bringing it closer to the tiki realm.
garnish: Garnish with a lemon wheel and an orchid

ingredients.name: Scotch whiskey
ingredients.description: Produced in Scotland, typically made from malted barley, and aged for a minimum period in oak barrels. Scotch can be further classified into single malt, single grain, blended malt, blended grain, and blended Scotch whisky.

ingredients.name: Orgeat Syrup
ingredients.description: Sweet syrup made from almonds, sugar, and rose water or orange flower water.

ingredients.name: Simple Syrup
ingredients.description: Syrup made with sugar and water. Usually in 1:1 or 2:1 ratio.
